header.title: Izixhobo zeSalatiso OHS
intro.title: Ukhuseleko Lokwakha
intro.description: Qinisekisa ukuthobela imimiselo yokhuseleko lokwakha ngokusebenzisa izixhobo zeSalatiso OHS. Izibonelelo zethu zinceda ukulawula umngcipheko, ukuthobela imithetho, nokukhusela abasebenzi kwisiza, zisebenzisa iindlela ezilungileyo ezichazwe kwi-"Ukukhuseleka Kuqala: Izinto Ezibalulekileyo zeZicwangciso ze-OHS."
legal_obligations.client.title: Iimbopheleleko Zomthengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Umgaqo Wokwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela uVavanyo loMngcipheko weSiseko (BRA) oluchaza iingozi zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Umgaqo Wokwakha 5(1)(b): Nikeza iNkcazo yeMpilo noKhuseleko echaza iimfuno ezikhethekileyo zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Umgaqo Wokwakha 5(1)(l): Vumela iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko seKontraka ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Iimbopheleleko zeKontraka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Umgaqo Wokwakha 7(1)(a): Phuhlisa iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko esisekelwe kwinkcazo yomthengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Umgaqo Wokwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina ifayile yeMpilo noKhuseleko kwisiza enazo zonke iincwadi ezifunekayo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Umgaqo Wokwakha 9: Qhuba uVavanyo lweNgozi kunye noKuchonga (HIRAs) ngokukhethekileyo kwimisebenzi ethile.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Iimbopheleleko Zobungcali be-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Umgaqo Wokwakha 5(5): Ama-arhente (PrCHSA) alawula i-H&S egameni lomthengi, eqinisekisa ukuthobela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Umgaqo Wokwakha 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) ancedisa abakontraka ekusebenziseni nasekuqapheliseni iinkqubo ze-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Izikhokelo ze-SACPCMP: Kufuneka agcine ubhaliso kunye neemfuno ze-CPD kwiindima zobungcali.
wizard.step_0: Nceda khetha isenzo ukuze uqale inkqubo.
wizard.step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwezili-9: Ufuna Ukwenza Ntoni?
wizard.step_1.label: Khetha Amaxwebhu Ozowadibanisa (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
wizard.step_1.error: Nceda khetha okungenani uxwebhu olulodwa ozoludibanisa.
wizard.step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwezili-9: Iinkcukacha zoMthengi
wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwezili-9: Ingaba iKontraka Iqeshiwe?
wizard.step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwezili-9: Iinkcukacha zeKontraka
wizard.step_5.title: Inyathelo 5 kwezili-9: Iinkcukacha zeProjekthi
wizard.step_6.title: Inyathelo 6 kwezili-9: Ububanzi beProjekthi
wizard.step_7.title: Inyathelo 7 kwezili-9: Idityaniswe Ngu
wizard.step_8.title: Inyathelo 8 kwezili-9: Idityaniswe Ngu
wizard.step_8.specify_error: Nceda uchaze ukuba uxwebhu ludityaniswe ngubani.
wizard.step_9.title: Inyathelo 9 kwezili-9: Phonononga kwaye Faka kwiNgobozi
wizard.step_9.description: Phonononga izinto ozikhethileyo kwaye ufake amaxwebhu kwingobozi yakho ukuze uqhubeke.
cart.title: Ingobozi Yakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo Yereferensi Ye-invoyisi: (Ivumelekile iintsuku ezi-7. Bhalisa ukuze ugcine unomphela!)
resources.title: Nxibelelana Nabaqeqeshi Abavunyiweyo be-H&S
resources.description: Udinga uncedo lobungcali? Nxibelelana nabaqeqeshi abavunyiweyo ngeemfuno zeprojekthi yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, I-Arhente ye-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo Yobhaliso: PR12345 - Unxibelelwano: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Igosa le-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo Yobhaliso: CHSO67890 - Unxibelelwano: john.smith@example.com
footer.copyright: © 2025 Izixhobo zeSalatiso OHS. Onke Amalungelo Agciniwe.
footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Uhlaziyiwe
chatbot.response: Ndilapha ukukunceda! Ukuze ufumane iingcebiso ezineenkcukacha ze-OHS, nceda udibane nengcali.
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 Ukuthobela kwe-OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Qala ngokukhetha inkonzo ukuze uqinisekise ukuthobela uMthetho Wempilo noKhuseleko Emsebenzini.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Inyaniso Emnandi: Ngaba uyazi ukuba amaxwebhu e-OHS afanelekileyo anokunciphisa iziganeko emsebenzini ukuya kuthi ga kwi-30%? Masiqale!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_1.description: Umgaqo wokwakha 5(1)(b) ufuna iNkcazo yeMpilo noKhuseleko kuzo zonke iiprojekthi, ngelixa i-7(1)(b) ifuna Ifayile ye-H&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Inyaniso Emnandi: INkcazo ye-H&S eyomeleleyo inokunciphisa iingozi ngama-30%! Ifana nesikhuselo sokhuseleko seprojekthi yakho.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_2.description: Umgaqo wokwakha 5: Abathengi kufuneka banike iNkcazo yeMpilo noKhuseleko kwaye baqinisekise ukuthobela kwabakontraka.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Inyaniso Emnandi: Abathengi abagcina ubhaliso lwabo lwe-COIDA luhlaziyekile banokuphepha izohlwayo ezinkulu—gcina loo nombolo ikufuphi!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_3.description: Umgaqo wokwakha 7(1)(a): Abakontraka kufuneka baphuhlise iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko esisekelwe kwinkcazo yomthengi.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Inyaniso Emnandi: Ukuqesha ikontraka kwangethuba kunokukhawulezisa ukuthobela—ukusebenzisana kwenza iphupho lokhuseleko lisebenze!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_4.description: Umgaqo wokwakha 7(1)(b): Abakontraka kufuneka bagcine ifayile yeMpilo noKhuseleko kwisiza enazo zonke iincwadi ezifunekayo.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Inyaniso Emnandi: Ukuba neenkcukacha zokunxibelelana nekontraka zilungile kunokusindisa imini ngexesha likaxakeka—hlala unxibelelana!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_5.description: Umgaqo wokwakha 3(1): Imvume iyafuneka kwiiprojekthi ezingaphezulu kwe-R40,000 okanye ezithatha iintsuku ezingaphezulu kwe-180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Inyaniso Emnandi: Iidilesi zesayithi ezicacileyo zinceda iinkonzo zikaxakeka zikufumane ngokukhawuleza—ungavumeli impazamo yokuchwetheza ibambeze uncedo!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_6.description: Umgaqo wokwakha 9: Ukuvavanya umngcipheko kunye nokuchonga iingozi (HIRAs) ngokukhethekileyo kuyafuneka kuyo yonke imisebenzi.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Inyaniso Emnandi: Ukuchonga imisebenzi enomngcipheko kwangethuba kunokunciphisa umngcipheko nge-25%—ifana nokunika iprojekthi yakho amandla okhuseleko!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_7.description: Izikhokelo ze-SACPCMP: Ama-CHSO nama-PrCHSA kufuneka agcine ubhaliso kunye neemfuno ze-CPD ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Inyaniso Emnandi: Ingcali ebhalisiweyo ye-SACPCMP inokunciphisa kakhulu iingozi zomthetho—i-MVP yokhuseleko seprojekthi yakho!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_8.description: Umgaqo wokwakha 5(1)(l): Abathengi kufuneka bavume iSicwangciso se-H&S sekontraka ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Inyaniso Emnandi: Ukuziphendulela okucacileyo kumaxwebhu kunokunyusa ukungafihli kwiprojekthi—wonke umntu uyayazi indima yakhe!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_9.description: Umthetho Wempilo noKhuseleko Emsebenzini: Amaxwebhu afanelekileyo aqinisekisa ukuthobela kwaye akhusele bonke abachaphazelekayo.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Inyaniso Emnandi: Ingobozi yakho sisixhobo sakho sokhuseleko—uxwebhu ngalunye olufakayo lwenza iprojekthi yakho ikhuseleke ngakumbi!
training.title: Uqeqesho Olupheleleyo Lwendawo Yomsebenzi
training.description: Phonononga iinkqubo zethu zoqeqesho ezibanzi ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela imimiselo ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika kwaye ukhuthaze indawo yokusebenza ekhuselekileyo. Khetha uqeqesho ngesandla, ngesahluko, okanye usebenzise isikhokelo sethu ukuze ufumane iingcebiso ezilungiselelwe wena ngokusekelwe kwishishini lakho, abaphulaphuli abakhethiweyo, kunye nendawo.
training.wizard.start: Nceda khetha inketho ukuze uqale inkqubo yesincomo soqeqesho.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwezili-5: Khetha Ishishini Lakho
training.wizard.step_1.label: Ishishini:
training.wizard.step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwezili-5: Khetha Abaphulaphuli Abakhethiweyo
training.wizard.step_2.label: Abaphulaphuli Abakhethiweyo (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Iqela Leemeko Zikaxakeka (Abanikezeli Boncedo Lokuqala, Abacimi Bomlilo)
training.wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwezili-5: Chaza Indawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwezili-5: Imiqathango Eyongezelelweyo
training.wizard.step_5.title: Inyathelo 5 kwezili-5: Phonononga Uqeqesho Olunconyiwe
training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kwizinto ozifakileyo, nazi iinkqubo zoqeqesho ezinconyiwe. Khetha ezo ufuna ukuzifaka kwingobozi yakho.
training.cart.title: Ingobozi Yakho Yoqeqesho
training.cart.customization.title: Lungisa Izixhobo Zakho Zoqeqesho
training.cart.customization.first_aider_: Nceda ugcwalise igama lomniki woncedo lokuqala.
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Nceda ugcwalise inombolo yomnxeba yemeko zikaxakeka evumelekileyo (umz., +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Idityaniswe Ngu
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela Yokuqhuba Uqeqesho
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetha Indlela Yokuqhuba:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Isaziso se-SafetyHelp: Izixhobo zoqeqesho ezinikeziweyo zezolwazi kuphela kwaye aziboneleli ngeengcebiso zobungcali. Ukuze ufumane izisombululo ze-OHS ezilungiselelwe wena, nxibelelana ne-SafetyHelp ku-support@safetyhelp.co.za okanye utyelele Ikhasi Lokunxibelelana.
training.checkout.success: Ukukhokha kuphumelele! Izixhobo zakho zoqeqesho zivelisiwe. Khuphela ama-PDF akho apha ngezantsi. Uqeqesho lwe-intanethi, amakhodi okungena athunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyili.
training.providers.title: Ababoneleli Boqeqesho Abavunyiweyo
training.providers.description: Udinga uqeqesho olwenziwa ngumntu? Nxibelelana nababoneleli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo ngeemfuno zakho.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - Ivunywe yi-SETA - Igxile kwiNcedo Lokuqala, Ukucima Umlilo - Unxibelelwano: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Ibhaliswe kwi-SACPCMP - Igxile kuKhuseleko loKwakha - Unxibelelwano: training@safeskills.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga Incwadi Yoqeqesho Enokulungiswa
training.manual.purchase.description: Fumana incwadi yoqeqesho ebanzi elungiselelwe inkampani yakho, equka iimfuno zomthetho, umxholo okhethekileyo wenkampani ngokusekelwe kwiphrofayile yomngcipheko wakho, kunye neengcaphuno ezivela kubaboneleli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza Iphrofayile yoMngcipheko Wakho Yencwadi Yoqeqesho
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Iphrofayile yoMngcipheko:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho Yoqeqesho
training.legal_fact.step_1: Inyaniso Yomthetho: UMthetho we-OHS Isigaba 8 ufuna ukuba abaqeshi banikeze uqeqesho olulungiselelwe iingozi ezithile zendawo yokusebenza.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Inyaniso Emnandi: Ngaba uyazi ukuba uqeqesho rhoqo lunokunciphisa iziganeko emsebenzini ukuya kuthi ga kwi-30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Inyaniso Yomthetho: Oomasipala bendawo banokuba nemithetho ethile ye-OHS ehlukileyo echaphazela iimfuno zoqeqesho.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Inyaniso Emnandi: Iindawo zokusebenza ezinomngcipheko ophezulu njengeziza zokwakha zifuna uqeqesho oluthe gqolo ukuze zigcine imigangatho yokhuseleko.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Inyaniso Yomthetho: UMthetho we-OHS uyawuyalela uqeqesho lweendima ezithile njengabameli be-SHE ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela.
